column5: Did the drive from Carnarvon to Huntsville yesterday. Most lakes are within days of being open. If there is still ice, it's dark and punky. Several lakes were already open. I checked out a couple of side roads: very few ice patches on most and very dry for this time of year.
Thanks SD! Looks like Easter wknd just got a little more promising!!
thanks for the news, and any updates would be greatly appreciated...as was said, Easter weekend just sounded better
